message:
modern agile and safety , Safety can affect your work more than expected 
your feedback is appreciated
story: Mona Shokrof shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Modern Agile إجعل الأمان شرطا أساسيا Make safety a prerequisite - MONA SHOKROF - Agile Coach and Trainer
caption: shokrof.com
description: إجعل الأمان شرطا أساسيا Make safety a prerequisite تاني مبدأ و هو مرتبط قوي بالمبدأ الاول هو “إجعل الأمان شرطا أساسيا” او “Make safety a prerequisite” و هنا اول حاجة بتيجي في دماغنا هي الامان ان الموظفين يتكلموا مع مديرهم و يسمعهم بس الحقيقة ده جزء بس من الامان المقصود هنا . الحقيقة اننا هنا …

data.message:
Awesome read, and a topic that doesn't get enough coverage.
Thanks for sharing the actual presentation at the end. Very nice one to watch.

You also are an awesome writer. The article flow is very easy to follow, even in the one big paragraph in the middle.

On that side, one comment I would have for improving it even further, is adding a little bit of intro at the beginning. I got confused by the opening talking about the second thing and the first thing and I wasn't sure what was up. I didn't realize this was a series till the end. You might want to explain that up front.

Again, overall, great work. Keep it up 👍
